goal.ch: "本課內容主要為關於光波的一般知識,其間特別加強其與傅氏光學和晶體光學相關之處,使得學生有一個較強固的基礎去修讀前述兩門本所的核心課程."
goal.en: To give students a general knowledge of light waves and to provide a solid foundation for the courses of Fourier Optics and Crystal Optics which are 2 of the core courses of our graduate program.

outline.ch:
1. Vector analysis
2. Maxwell equations
3. Wave equations and plane wave solution
4. Reflection and refraction of plane waves
5. Guided waves
6. Radiation
outline.en:
1. Vector analysis
2. Maxwell equations
3. Wave equations and plane wave solution
4. Reflection and refraction of plane waves
5. Guided waves
6. Radiation

textbook.ch:
"1. Dale R. Corson, Paul Lorrain and Francois Lorrain, Fundamentals of Electromagnetic Phenomena (New York : W.H. Freeman, c2000)
2. David K. Cheng, Field and Wave Electromagnetics , 2nd ed.  (Addison-Wesley,
1989).
3. M.A. Heald and J.B. Marion, Classical electromagnetic radiation 3rd Ed.(Saunders College Publishing)
4. 自寫講義"
textbook.en:
"1. Dale R. Corson, Paul Lorrain and Francois Lorrain, Fundamentals of Electromagnetic Phenomena (New York : W.H. Freeman, c2000)
2. David K. Cheng, Field and Wave Electromagnetics , 2nd ed.  (Addison-Wesley,
1989).
3. M.A. Heald and J.B. Marion, Classical electromagnetic radiation 3rd Ed.(Saunders College Publishing)
4. The instructor‘s own lecture notes."

gradMethod.ch: "本課包含三次考試及平時習作, 學期總成績由此四項成績相加而得,各佔四分之一"
gradMethod.en: "There will be 3 exams and weekly home work exercises in this course, and the final grade will be obtained evenly from the grades of these 4 sets of grades."
